template.name: sqlAlterTableColumnVarchar
template.value: "ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN new_column VARCHAR DEFAULT (null)"
template.description: "ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN new_column VARCHAR DEFAULT (null)"

template.name: sqlAlterTableColumnInteger
template.value: "ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN new_column INTEGER DEFAULT 0"
template.description: "ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN new_column INTEGER DEFAULT 0"

template.name: sqlCreateTableIfNotExists
template.value: private final String CREATE_TABLE_APP_HISTORY = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + TABLE_APP_HISTORY + " (" + " auto_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT," + " id INTEGER," + " title VARCHAR," + " sub_title VARCHAR," + " item_type INTEGER DEFAULT (0)," + " view_count INTEGER DEFAULT (0)," + " json_data VARCHAR," + " item_state VARCHAR," + " cat_id INTEGER," + " sub_cat_id INTEGER," + " created_at VARCHAR," + " image VARCHAR," + " video VARCHAR," + " url VARCHAR," + " extra_data VARCHAR" + ");";
template.description: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_NAME
